landing.private_invite_only: This is a private, invite-only platform. Enter your access code to continue.
landing.invalid_access_code: Invalid access code. Please try again.
landing.must_accept_terms: You must accept the Terms of Use to continue.
landing.agree_to_terms_after: and acknowledge that my participation in this community is subject to adherence to the community guidelines.
landing.terms_title: ONYX Community Platform - Terms of Use
landing.terms_acceptance_body: By accessing and using the ONYX platform, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use the platform.
landing.terms_eligibility_body: ONYX is designed for professionals aged 18-35. By using this platform, you confirm that you meet the eligibility requirements and have received a valid access code through an authorized invitation.
landing.terms_anonymous_profiles_body: Users create profiles using aliases. Your real identity remains hidden until you choose to accept a connection. You agree not to misrepresent your professional background, interests, or intentions on the platform.
landing.terms_community_conduct_body: You agree to engage respectfully with all community members. Harassment, discrimination, spam, solicitation, or any form of abusive behavior is strictly prohibited and may result in immediate removal from the platform.
landing.terms_connections_body: When you accept a connection, your chosen contact information (phone, email, or LINE) will be shared with the other party. You are responsible for the information you choose to share and how you use others' contact details.
landing.terms_events_groups_body: Users may propose events and suggest interest groups, which are subject to admin approval. The platform reserves the right to approve, deny, or remove any user-submitted content at its discretion.
landing.terms_privacy_body: We respect your privacy. Your personal data is used solely for the purpose of providing the platform's matching and community features. We do not sell or share your information with third parties.
landing.terms_account_termination_body: ONYX reserves the right to suspend or terminate any account that violates these terms or community guidelines without prior notice.
landing.terms_disclaimer_body: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. ONYX is not responsible for the outcomes of connections, events, or interactions facilitated through the platform.
landing.terms_changes_body: These terms may be updated from time to time. Continued use of the platform after changes constitutes acceptance of the revised terms.
landing.tagline: A private network for professionals seeking meaningful connections.

onboarding.alias_min_length: Alias must be at least 2 characters

suggested.suggest_when_found: We'll suggest mentor/mentee connections when we find people in your industry with complementary goals.

connections.no_connections: No connections yet. Discover new people to connect with!

events.submit_for_approval: Submit your event for admin approval. Once approved, it will be visible to all members.
